column4: I'm having some problems with restarting/shutting down anyone had / know a soloution could help out ?
when i restart it hangs / freezes i get text on my screen with[ok] then sometimes it gives me a message saying 'wait for restart ' or something
the last time I restarted i got '' mount : / is busy ''
what version of Ubuntu? how long have you been running this version of Ubuntu? when was the last time your system worked properly?
